attributes.action: Non-resident CSA Payments and child contact.
attributes.additional_details:
To many parents with care are refusing contact to the non resident parent with their child.
The resident parent can chose to exclude the no resident parent out of the child's life and still claim money from them.

This needs to change, if the resident parent is not willingly allowing the child contact with the non resident parent, they should not be allowed to claim child maintenance from them.

The givernment need to review how the CSA enforces these payments and take into account how the resident parent is clearly, using the child as a leaver to earn as much money as they can.
